title: Lammy backtracks on Farage Hitler Youth claim
description: The deputy prime minister says he is "happy to clarify" comments he made about the Reform UK leader.
content:
Deputy Prime Minister David Lammy rowed back on claims Nigel Farage "flirted with Hitler Youth".
Lammy's comments were an apparent reference to allegations that emerged in 2013 that Farage sang Nazi songs as a teenager.
The Reform UK leader denied th... [1969 chars]

title: SpaceX has a few tricks up its sleeve for the last Starship flight of the year
description: SpaceX will reuse a Super Heavy booster with 24 previously flown Raptor engines.
content:
On its surface, the flight plan for SpaceX's next Starship flight looks a lot like the last one.
The rocket's Super Heavy booster will again splash down in the Gulf of Mexico just offshore from SpaceX's launch site in South Texas. And Starship, the r... [5771 chars]

title: Tony Blair’s role in Gaza peace plan sparks fierce responses from his Labour colleagues
description: Prominent members of Starmer’s Cabinet applauded the former Labour leader’s involvement despite misgivings from critics.
content:
LIVERPOOL, England — U.K. Business Secretary Peter Kyle launched a fierce defense Tuesday of Tony Blair’s role in Donald Trump’s peace plan for Gaza, saying: “We should celebrate this.”
No sooner had Trump released a 20-point proposal for establishin... [4312 chars]

title: Northern Lights visible in UK tonight as 'red alert' issued for Aurora Borealis
description: A red alert has been issued for the Northern Lights, meaning there is a high chance of being able to see them in the UK in the coming hours
content:
Brits have been put on 'red alert' for a spectacular Northern Lights display that could be visible within hours.
AuroraWatch UK has issued a red alert, indicating a high likelihood of sightings, provided the sky remains clear and not overly cloudy. T... [1262 chars]

title: Amazon Echo Studio and Echo Dot Max hands-on: More bass, round shapes
description: Amazon announced the new Echo Studio and Echo Dot Max speakers at an event in New York City on Tuesday. We were briefly able to take a listen.
content: Among the horde of new devices Amazon unveiled during its New York City event on Tuesday are two new Echo speakers: a higher-end Echo Dot called the Echo Dot Max and a next-generation Echo Studio with a new ball-shaped design. Both are available to p... [4508 chars]
